example.text: STANDING UP FOR THE SECOND AMENDMENT Last week, Illinois Democrats held hearings on House Bill 5855 to diminish Second Amendment rights in Illinois. The Left is working to release dangerous criminals onto our streets, defund the police, and ban guns so you have no way to protect yourself or your family!

We’ve had a crisis at our border since Joe Biden took office. Today, the House is passing a bill I am cosponsoring to: ?Finish President Trump’s Border Wall ?Hire 22,000 Border Patrol Agents ?End the “Catch and Release” of illegal immigrants into our communities [[url]]

The Biden Administration has illegally opened our southern border to facilitate the largest invasion in human history, resulting in crime, fentanyl, and human trafficking. Joe Biden must be impeached for violating his oath to defend our border & uphold our immigration laws, and the Biden-Harris officials who opened our border should be prosecuted for the harm they are causing our country!
Extreme gun laws have only made crime worse. I am proud to belong to the Second Amendment Caucus and will always stand for our constitutional right to keep and bear arms in Congress!

As a farmer, I know that foreign land purchases are especially an issue in rural America where the Chinese Communist Party is attempting to buy land in our country to gain strategic leverage over the United States and our food supply. Our adversaries continue to rob our country of wealth and prosperity under Joe Biden's weak leadership and it's time for Congress to act.

STANDING UP FOR THE SECOND AMENDMENT Last week, Illinois Democrats held hearings on House Bill 5855 to diminish Second Amendment rights in Illinois. The Left is working to release dangerous criminals onto our streets, defund the police, and ban guns so you have no way to protect yourself or your family!
